overview: Sean Donn, Chief Technology Officer of Credit Sesame, has 16 years experience in information technology and software engineering, with expertise in large distributed systems and Internet, web technology. He was previously the CTO and VP of Engineering at Financial Crossing Inc. Earlier in his career, he was at Charles Schwab for eight years, where among several efforts he architected and implemented one of the largest cost basis accounting engines for retail brokerage accounts, tracking $1T in assets. Sean studied at the Massachusetts Institute of Technology
